Globus pallidus of WHS11.Definition: Delineation of the globus pallidus in the Waxholm mouse atlas as seen in T2* and T2W weighted volumes.  As seen in coronal: medial and adjacent to caudate putamen. Boundary determined in T2* by textural difference. In T2W, has lower intensity that caudate putamen.  Does not include the entopeduncular nucleus.
